Class Junior

java.lang.Object
assignment.support.Person
assignment.core.Staff
assignment.core.Junior
All Implemented Interfaces:
Employee, java.io.Serializable
public class Junior
extends Staff
implements java.io.Serializable
maintains information about junior staffs working at the restaurant.
